thread.title: Google to set up Wi-Fi in 400 Indian railway stations
thread.title_full: Google to set up Wi-Fi in 400 Indian railway stations

title: Google to set up Wi-Fi in 400 Indian railway stations
text:
Topix › Science / Technology › Google to set up Wi-Fi in 400 Indian ... Google to set up Wi-Fi in 400 Indian railway stations Next Story Prev Story 4 hrs ago Read more: ComputerWorld 
Google is to provide high-speed public Wi-Fi in 400 Indian railway stations that carry millions of passengers every day, giving the company an important headway in the country. The Internet giant is working with the Indian Railways and RailTel, a government-owned provider of telecommunications infrastructure to the railways, to initially cover 100 of the busiest stations in India before the end of 2016. Start the conversation, or Read more at ComputerWorld.
